Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1970...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cleveland on 2/13/1970 (Going to LA: SS J. Sexton. Going to CLE: 1B C. Chambliss)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/19/1971, off Ken Sanders (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1973, off Dave Debusschere (CHW)...
Injured on 6/5/1977 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/6/1981 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 4/20/1981 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 6/22/1981 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/14/1982 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Released by Cleveland on 8/8/1984...
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1987...
Injured on 4/19/1990 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/7/1990 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/24/1994, off Bill Landrum (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/30/1994, off Andy Ashby (NYM)...
Injured on 9/24/1994 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
